tasks.label: 1. Initialize Mobile Platforms (Android & iOS)
tasks.detail: Generates both android and ios folders in one step.

tasks.label: 2. Open Android Studio (APK)
tasks.command: npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
tasks.detail: Syncs changes and opens Android Studio to build APKs.

tasks.label: 3. Open Xcode (iOS)
tasks.command: npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open ios
tasks.detail: Syncs changes and opens Xcode to build the iOS App.
